properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Chester River to Queenstown MD; Eastern Bay; Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 9:02PM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 1 to 3 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30
kt expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD,
Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD, Chester
River to Queenstown MD and Eastern Bay.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 10 AM EST Sunday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
